custom-action.name: TextGet
custom-action.description:
This Action extracts text from a window (by filling parameter "windowName") OR from a specific region (by filling parameter "windowRect").
Possible parameters are: - windowName (optional): Window name defining working area, that can be a regexp like "Calculator.*". If empty, the full screenshot is the working area. - windowRect (optional): Region of the window in the format: [poxX,poxY,width,height]. It will be absolute coordinate if no "windowName", or relative coordinate if "windowName" is specified or empty if full screenshot. - inverseColor (required): When recognizing white text over black background, set it to true to best result. Default value is "false". - variableName (optional): NeoLoad variable in which to put the text extracted from the screen. Default value is "textGetVariableName".
